title: Young Schema Questionnaire YSQ-3
description_1: The questionnaire includes 90 statements that you can use to describe yourself. Sequentially, read each statement and choose from the provided options how accurately it characterizes you. If you are unsure how to answer, rely on how you feel rather than what you think is right.
description_2: Choose the appropriate answer and click the 'Next Question' button. Once you have answered all 90 questions, a results table will appear on the screen. If you need to send the test results to your email, there will be an email input field below the table. To complete the test, be sure to click the 'Finish' button.
description_3: Before starting the test, you will need to enter your name. Your name and answers will be stored on your device during the test, allowing you to resume the test from where you left off in case you accidentally close the tab or turn off the device. For a comfortable test experience, you can choose a light or dark theme in the top right corner of the screen.
saved_data: An unfinished test has been detected on your device for the name  -
input_name: To start the test, please enter your name:
input_error_message: use only Cyrillic or Latin letters and spaces, text length no more than 40 characters
result_page_text_1: You can get a detailed overview of the results from the specialist who referred you for testing, you should not interpret the results yourself.
result_page_text_2: If you need to send the result by email, enter your address, if not, then leave the input field empty. To complete the test and save the results, click 'Finish' and wait for the success message (it may take 1-2 minutes, the application is still on free hosting, that's why there is such a delay). Afterwards, you will be redirected to the test home page.
test_error: Save error, please try again later
wrong_password: You entered the wrong password, try again:
name: Client's name
YSQ_S3_question_1: I haven't had someone to nurture me, share him/herself with me, or care about everything that happens to me
YSQ_S3_question_2: I find myself clinging to people I'm close to because I'm afraid they'll leave me
YSQ_S3_question_3: I feel that people will take advantage of me
YSQ_S3_question_5: No man/woman I desire could love me once he or she saw my defects or flaws
YSQ_S3_question_6: Almost nothing I do at work (or school) is as good as other people can do
YSQ_S3_question_7: I do not feel capable of getting by on my own in everyday life
YSQ_S3_question_8: I can't seem to escape the feeling that something bad is about to happen
YSQ_S3_question_9: I have not been able to separate myself from my parent(s) the way other people my age seem to
YSQ_S3_question_10: I think that if I do what I want, I'm only asking for trouble
YSQ_S3_question_11: I'm the one who usually ends up taking care of the people I'm close to
YSQ_S3_question_12: I am too self-conscious to show positive feelings to others (e.g., affection, showing care)
YSQ_S3_question_13: I must be the best at most of what I do; I can't accept second best
YSQ_S3_question_14: I have a lot of trouble accepting 'no' for and answer when I want something from other people
YSQ_S3_question_15: I can't seem to discipline myself to complete most routine or boring tasks
YSQ_S3_question_16: Having money and knowing important people makes me feel worthwhile
YSQ_S3_question_17: Even when things seem to be going well, I feel that it is only temporary
YSQ_S3_question_18: If I make a mistake, I deserve to be punished
YSQ_S3_question_19: I don't have people to give me warmth, holding, and affection
YSQ_S3_question_20: I need other people so much that I worry about losing them
YSQ_S3_question_21: I feel that I cannot let my guard down in the presence of other people, or else they will intentionally hurt me
YSQ_S3_question_22: I'm fundamentally different from other people
YSQ_S3_question_23: No one I desire would want to stay close to me if he or she knew the real me
YSQ_S3_question_24: I'm incompetent when it comes to achievement
YSQ_S3_question_25: I think of myself as a dependent person when it comes to everyday functioning
YSQ_S3_question_26: I feel that a disaster (natural, criminal, fina ncial, or medical) could strike at any moment
YSQ_S3_question_27: My parent(s) and I tend to be over-involved in each other's lives and problems
YSQ_S3_question_28: I feel as if I have no choice but to give in to others more than myself
YSQ_S3_question_29: I am a good person because I think of others more than myself
YSQ_S3_question_30: I find it embarrassing to express my feelings to others
YSQ_S3_question_31: I try to do my best; I can't settle for 'good enough'
YSQ_S3_question_32: I'm special and shouldn't have to accept many of the restrictions or limitations placed on other people
YSQ_S3_question_33: I can't reach a goal, I become easily frustrated and give up
YSQ_S3_question_34: Accomplishments are most valuable to me if other people notice them
YSQ_S3_question_35: If something good happens, I worry that something bad is likely to follow
YSQ_S3_question_36: If I don't try my hardest, I should expect to lose out
YSQ_S3_question_37: I haven't felt that I am special to someone
YSQ_S3_question_38: I worry that people I feel close to will leave me or abandon me
YSQ_S3_question_39: It is only a matter of time before someone betrays me
YSQ_S3_question_40: I don't belong; I'm a loner
YSQ_S3_question_41: I'm unworthy of the love, attention, and respect of others
YSQ_S3_question_42: Most other people are more capable than I am in areas of work and achievement
YSQ_S3_question_44: I worry about being physically attacked by people
YSQ_S3_question_45: It is very difficult for my parent(s) and me to keep intimate details from each other without feeling betrayed or guilty
YSQ_S3_question_46: In relationships, I usually let the other person have the upper hand
YSQ_S3_question_47: I'm so busy doing things for the people that I care about that I have little time for myself
YSQ_S3_question_48: I find it hard to be free-spirited and spontaneous around other people
YSQ_S3_question_49: I must meet all my responsibilities
YSQ_S3_question_50: I hate to be constrained or kept from doing what I want
YSQ_S3_question_51: I have a very difficult time sacrificing immediate gratification or pleasure to achieve a long-range goal
YSQ_S3_question_52: Unless I get a lot of attention from others, I feel less important
YSQ_S3_question_53: You can't be too careful; something will almost always go wrong
YSQ_S3_question_54: If I don't do the job right, I should suffer the consequences
YSQ_S3_question_55: I have not had someone who really listens to me, understands me, or is tuned into my true needs and feelings
YSQ_S3_question_56: When someone I care for seems to be pulling away or withdrawing from me, I feel desperate
YSQ_S3_question_57: I am quite suspicious of other people's motives
YSQ_S3_question_58: I feel alienated or cut off from other people
YSQ_S3_question_59: I feel that I'm not lovable
YSQ_S3_question_60: I'm not as talented as most people are at work (or school)
YSQ_S3_question_61: My judgment cannot be counted on in everyday situations
YSQ_S3_question_62: I worry that I'll lose all my money and become destitute or very poor
YSQ_S3_question_63: I often feel as if my parent's are living through me - that I don't have a life of my own
YSQ_S3_question_64: I've always let others make choices for me, so I really don't know what I want for myself
YSQ_S3_question_65: I've always been the one who listens to everyone else's problems
YSQ_S3_question_66: I control myself so much that many people think I am unemotional or unfeeling
YSQ_S3_question_67: I feel that there is constant pressure for me to achieve and get things done
YSQ_S3_question_68: I feel that I shouldn't have to follow the normal rules or conventions that other people do
YSQ_S3_question_69: I can't force myself to do things I don't enjoy, even when I know it's for my own good
YSQ_S3_question_70: I make remarks at meetings or when introduced in social situations, it's important for me to get recognition and admiration
YSQ_S3_question_71: No matter how hard I work, I worry that I could be wiped out financially and lose almost everything
YSQ_S3_question_72: It doesn't matter why I make a mistake. When I do something wrong, I should pay the consequences
YSQ_S3_question_73: I haven't had a strong or wise person to give me sound advice or direction when I'm not sure what to do
YSQ_S3_question_74: Sometimes I am so worried about people leaving me that I drive them away
YSQ_S3_question_75: I'm usually on the lookout for people's ulterior or hidden motives
YSQ_S3_question_76: I always feel on the outside of groups
YSQ_S3_question_77: I am too unacceptable in very basic ways to reveal myself to other people or to let them get to know me well
YSQ_S3_question_78: I'm not as intelligent as most people when it comes to work (or school)
YSQ_S3_question_79: I don't feel confident about my ability to solve everyday problems that come up
YSQ_S3_question_80: I worry that I'm developing a serious illness, even though nothing serious has been diagnosed by a doctor
YSQ_S3_question_81: I often feel I do not have a separate identity, from my parent(s) or partner
YSQ_S3_question_82: I have a lot of trouble demanding that my rights be respected and that my feelings be taken into account
YSQ_S3_question_83: Other people see me as doing too much for others and not enough for myself
YSQ_S3_question_84: People see me as uptight emotionally
YSQ_S3_question_85: I can't let myself off the hook easily or make excuses for my mistakes
YSQ_S3_question_86: I feel that what I have to offer is of greater value than the contributions of others
YSQ_S3_question_87: I have rarely been able to stick to my resolutions
YSQ_S3_question_88: Lots of praise and compliments make me feel like a worthwhile person
YSQ_S3_question_89: I worry that a wrong decision could lead to disaster
YSQ_S3_question_90: I'm a bad person who deserves to be punished
